law.catch_line: Policy covering services performed by dentist deemed to cover such services performed by physician.
law.text: Any policy or contract of health insurance issued in this state which provides coverage for services which can be lawfully performed within the scope of the license of a duly licensed dentist, shall be deemed to provide benefits for such services whether performed by a duly licensed physician or a duly licensed dentist.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 112, sec. 2, effective June 19, 1976.
